text.0: ye gods Ādityas varuṇa aryaman mitra verily.
text.1: have here obtained supremest sway high holy set apart for you.
text.2: when varuṇa and mitra ye sit in your golden dwellingplace.
text.3: ye twain supporters of mankind foeslayers give felicity.
text.4: all these possessors of all wealth varuṇa mitra aryaman.
text.5: follow their ways as if with feet and guard from injury mortal man.
text.6: for they are true they cleave to law held holy among every race.
text.7: good leaders bounteous in their gifts deliverers even from distress.
text.8: which of your persons varuṇa or mitra merits not our praise.
text.9: therefore our thought is turned to you the atris thought is turned to you.
